name: Add date of birth field in user registration page
description: Add date of birth field in user registration page
llmTaskExplanation: Add a 'date of birth' field to the user registration page. This involves updating the user registration form to include a new input field for the date of birth, ensuring it is properly validated and stored in the database.
validations: Date of birth must be a valid date.
Date of birth cannot be a future date.
Date of birth must be in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
Date of birth is a required field.
unitTests: Test that the form renders with a date of birth field.
Test submitting the form with a valid date of birth.
Test submitting the form with an invalid date format.
Test submitting the form with a future date.
Test submitting the form without a date of birth.
acceptanceCriteria: Given a user is on the registration page, when they view the form, then they should see a date of birth field.
Given a user enters a valid date of birth, when they submit the form, then the registration should be successful.
Given a user enters an invalid date of birth, when they submit the form, then they should see an error message.
Given a user enters a future date as date of birth, when they submit the form, then they should see an error message.
technicalDependencies: Date input handling library if not already used in the project.
security: Ensure date of birth input is sanitized to prevent injection attacks.
performance: Ensure the addition of the date of birth field does not significantly impact form load time.
businessContext: The date of birth is likely used for age verification or personalization purposes.
otherNotes: Consider adding a tooltip or placeholder text to guide users on the date format.

llmAssumptions.assumption: The tech stack includes a frontend framework like React or Angular.
The backend is capable of handling date inputs and storing them in the database.
There is an existing user registration form to modify.
